summary: Completed comprehensive testing of XplicitkreationZ new features: Cart persistence with localStorage, ID upload for age verification, Dispatcher Console ID viewing, and mobile header tagline. All features working correctly. Backend: 14/14 tests passed. Frontend: All UI tests passed.
passed_tests: Cart persistence - items persist after page refresh using localStorage
ID verification section appears on cart page when items present
ID file upload input is functional with proper validation
'Upload ID to Continue' button text shows when ID not uploaded
Mobile header shows 'Smoke Shop Delivered' tagline (390px viewport)
Tablet header shows 'Smoke Shop Delivered' tagline (768px viewport)
Desktop header shows 'Smoke Shop Delivered' tagline
Dispatcher Console login with password 'xplicit2024'
Dispatcher Console shows 'View ID' button for orders with ID images
Dispatcher Console shows 'No ID uploaded' for orders without ID
ID view dialog opens with customer name and DOB
Manual verification message displayed in ID dialog
Backend: API health check
Backend: MongoDB ready check
Backend: Get products list
Backend: Get single product by ID
Backend: Delivery quote for valid Austin ZIP
Backend: Delivery quote rejects outside 40-mile radius
Backend: Delivery quote rejects non-Texas ZIP
Backend: Delivery quote rejects below minimum order
Backend: Create order with ID image
Backend: Order creation fails without ID image (400 error)
Backend: Underage order rejected (21+ enforcement)
Backend: Admin orders endpoint returns orders with id_image field
Backend: Order status update via admin endpoint
seed_data_creation: Created test orders with ID images (TEST_ID_User, TEST_IDCheck_User) for verification testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features (cart persistence, ID upload, dispatcher ID viewing, mobile tagline) are working correctly. Test orders with ID images were created and are visible in the Dispatcher Console. The localStorage key for cart is 'xplicit_cart'. Admin password is 'xplicit2024'.

cart_persistence.details: Cart items persist across page refreshes using localStorage with key 'xplicit_cart'

id_upload.details: ID verification section appears on cart page, file upload works, base64 image stored in order

dispatcher_id_view.details: Orders with ID show 'View ID' button, dialog displays ID image with customer name and DOB

mobile_tagline.details: 'Smoke Shop Delivered' tagline visible on all screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
